exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable n.
In environment H0 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> rem q p = r n, p, r : nat Unable to unify "div ?M1675 ?M1676 = ?M1677" with "rem (n * p + r) p = rem r p".

In environment H1 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n H : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> rem q p = r n, p, r : nat Unable to unify "rem r p" with "n * p + r".

In environment H3 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n H2 : forall q p : nat, q < p -> rem q p = q H0 : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> rem q p = r n, p, r : nat Unable to unify "rem (rem ?M2557 ?M2558) ?M2558 = rem ?M2557 ?M2558" with "rem (n * p + r) p = rem r p".

original: intros. intro H. apply rem_prop. apply div_prop. auto. apply rem_idem. apply rem_rem.
